        public Query getQuery()

                      DataProviderException

      • getQuery

        public Query getQuery(DataSetFeatureType featureType)
               throws javax.naming.OperationNotSupportedException,
                      DataProviderException
        Description copied from interface: DataSet
        Return a Query for querying data of the specific feature supported by this dataset. The returned query only contains fields related to the feature, and is by default ordered by the first value field (if there is any) descending.
        Specified by:
        getQuery in interface DataSet
        Parameters:
        featureType - type of the expected feature
        Returns:
        a Query against the provider of this dataset.
        Throws:
        javax.naming.OperationNotSupportedException - when dataset is not loadable
        DataProviderException - when actual data of the DataSet does not exist on the DataProvider
